name: sparkle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to shine brightly with a lot of small points of light: The snow/sea sparkled in the sunlight.
If a person or performance sparkles, they are energetic, interesting, and exciting: Alice is shy and quiet at parties, but her sister really sparkles!
